meanings.sent1: The brainwashers tried to manipulate people's thoughts.
meanings.sent2: The police were investigating the brainwashers in the cult.
meanings.sent3: The brainwashers at the seminar had a hypnotic effect on the audience.
meanings.sent4: The political party was accused of being brainwashers by their opponents.
meanings.sent5: The brainwashers used subtle techniques to control minds.

meanings.sent1: The brainwashers' tactics were exposed by the media.
meanings.sent2: The brainwashers of the advertising industry target vulnerable consumers.
meanings.sent3: The brainwashers in the movie made the audience question reality.
meanings.sent4: The brainwashers of society influence our beliefs without us realizing.
meanings.sent5: The brainwashers' influence was evident in the behavior of the group.
